column5: Hey guys, I was just thumbing through wholesalesports.com (canadian site) and I wandered into the Loomis rod section. They got GLX, GL2/3 and Walleye spinning and casting rods on sale for STUPID CHEAP. I may buy a few, just because they're too good to turn down   .  If anyones looking for a GLX for around 50%+ off...check it out!!!!  Mainly UL's but theres quite a few normal sizes in the mix too. Besides, havent you always wanted to treat yourself to a 5' IMX UL for whitefish
I dont see a sale ? is there a link for it
I didn't have any problems finding it.

I think this is what he's referring to:  Spinning Rods:  http://ca.wholesalesports.com/storefront/g.loomis/home/fishing/fresh-saltwater-fishing/spinning-rods/c0-c20-c201-c20102-b100330-p1.html  Casting Rods:  http://ca.wholesalesports.com/storefront/g.loomis/home/fishing/fresh-saltwater-fishing/casting-rods/c0-c20-c201-c20101-b100330-p1.html  It's always nice not having to deal with customs too.
You got it Ctranter. Also if you guys look under the normal loomis rods and just scroll through their different sizes/actions they have some hidden ones in there on sale too
Jeff this is the LAST thing u needed to wonder across!!
Ahh to be young and single with money to burn.
Thanks for posting this I was looking at the GL3 the other day and now I just have to sell the wife on it. So most likely I will have my GL3 very soon. Thanks again.
this one  Trout & Panfish Spinning - 2 Pcs., 4-10, 7' ?
No I was actually looking at the 1pc 6'6 turd Crankbait baitcast for $159.99 regularly $269.99.
It`s easier to ask forgiveness than permission!!!
You throw turds when your fishing?

Yea that's true asking for forgivness is easier lol, but I'll save that for something that cost a bit more lol. Like a new boat lol. And as for the turd, I have no clue what I was thinking when I wrote that I am assuming that I was calling my daughter a turd and wrote it not thinking but who knows lol.
I was wondering about the turd as well, I thought it was a new fangled bass lure!

It seems that our word filter interprets the letters "M' and "F" placed beside one another as a bad abbreviation. Unfortunately, Med. fast uses the same abbreviation. It's ridiculous, I've removed that filter.
